name: Ext_R5_Appointment_basedOn
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Appointment.basedOn for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Appointment.basedOn from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Appointment|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The request this appointment is allocated to assess
element.definition: The request this appointment is allocated to assess (e.g. incoming referral or procedure request).
element.comment: `Appointment.basedOn` maps to R4B `Appointment.basedOn`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CarePlan)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceRequest)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationRequest)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: The request this appointment is allocated to assess
